title: Top 10 reasons to watch anime
body:
konichiwa AD~
(that means "hello" in the language of prosperity and culture)
if you're not watching anime yet you should totally start~
you will have sugoi time for sure and here are the top reasons why~

1. Great plots
2. Oppai waifus
3. Cultural enlightment
4. Pantsu
5. Quality and non-repetitive music that comes with it
6. Kawaii flat waifus
7. It's so good you won't shut up about it
8. You will be cultured and entertained at the same time!
9. Best rule 34 fan art
10. You get to use anime reaction gifs/pics and avatars ALL the time

Bonus: Anime is love anime is life

#stay kawaii AD
